response.job_title: Sales Support Coordinator TPMAR | Supply Chain | Business Intelligence |
response.summary: Industrial Engineer with focus on business intelligence and supply chain management. I work to increase the value generated seeking to achieve a strategic fit between the needs of the client and the capabilities of the supply chain, through BPM, data analysis, demand forecasts, operations planning and inventory management.
response.skills: Supply Chain Management, Operations Management, Modeling and Simulation, Inventory Control, Demand Planning, Process Simulation, Process Optimization, Quantitative Analysis, Data Visualization, SQL, Java, C++, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power Apps, Tableau, Demand Forecasting, Flexsim, GAMS

profile_positions.description:
•	Designed, modeled and controlled customer service processes for a new e-commerce sales channel.
•	Analyzed of data and key indicators to support decision-making processes.
•	Designed and developed online dashboards, improving decision-making processes. 
•	Designed, developed and maintained an information system for after-sales processes in a new e-commerce sales channel.
•	Analyzed and automated repetitive tasks, improving service times in after-sales processes.
•	Upgraded and redesigned Balanced Score Card from Excel to Tableau.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Analyst Jr.

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and implemented a work shift allocation model achieving a 7% improvement in call service levels.
• Updated Balanced Score Card. Measured and analyzed of key indicators.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Intern

company.name: Teleperformance
company.description:
Teleperformance is a global digital business services company. Our global scale and local presence allow us to be a force of good in supporting our communities, our clients, and the environment. 
We deliver the most advanced, digitally-powered business services to help the world’s best brands streamline their business in meaningful and sustainable ways.
